name: get_expressions
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dicolink.
Tool description: Dicolink API lets you retrieve information about French words, including definitions, synonyms, antonyms, quotes, expressions, lexical field, scrabble score, and much more...
API description: Fetch expressions that include a specified word from the Dicolink API.

mot.description: The word for which to retrieve expressions.

limite.description: The maximum number of expressions to retrieve. Defaults to '10'.
